EvaluationConfig.description: This configuration structure defines the JSON paths needed to extract specific values from trace data in JSON format. They are required for evaluation operations.

Context.description: The context node information referenced when the model answers a question.

JsonPathInSpan.description: The JSON path where the Context is stored in the trace log.

SpanName.description: The span name in the trace log.

JsonPathInSpanValue.description: If the value retrieved at the JSON path is itself a JSON string, a further JSON path must be defined within this JSON to obtain the actual value.

Answer.description: The answer to the user's question from the LLM application.

JsonPathInSpan.description: The JSON path where the Answer is stored in the trace log.

SpanName.description: The span name in the trace log.

JsonPathInSpanValue.description: If the value retrieved at the JSON path is itself a JSON string, a further JSON path must be defined within this JSON to obtain the actual value.

Query.description: The question from the user to the LLM application.

JsonPathInSpan.description: The JSON path where the Query is stored in the trace log.

SpanName.description: The span name in the trace log.

JsonPathInSpanValue.description: If the value retrieved at the JSON path is itself a JSON string, a further JSON path must be defined within this JSON to obtain the actual value.

ModelConfig.description: The access configuration structure of the model used in the evaluation.

Temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the model output. Maximum value: 0.2.

ApiKey.description: The authentication key required when the evaluation task calls a model which the user has permission to use, acting under the user's name.

Endpoint.description: The model service endpoint required when the evaluation task calls the model.

UseFunctionCall.description: Whether the model is allowed to use external tools.

TopP.description: Controls the randomness of the model output.

IsSelfHost.description: Whether the model service is provided by the user (True), or by Alibaba Cloud PAI (False).

EvaluateTrace.summary: Evaluates a specified piece of trace data.

schema.description: The trace ID.
The request body.

AppName.description: The name of the application to which the trace belongs.

MinTime.description: The start time of the search time range, in UTC format.

MaxTime.description: The end time of the search time range, in UTC format.

EvaluationConfig.description: If the value retrieved at the JSON path is itself a JSON string, further JSON path definitions within this JSON are necessary to get the actual value.

ModelConfig.description: The configuration structure to access the model used internally by the evaluation trace.

EvaluationId.description: The ID of the evaluation task. If not specified, the system randomly generates and returns an ID. You can use this ID to quickly search for evaluation results.

schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned if an exception occurred.

EvaluationId.description: the task ID of the evaluation task to which the trace belongs.

schema.description: Task ID.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.description: Internal error code. Set only when the response is in error.

Message.description: Response error message. Set only when the response is in error.

AliyunUid.description: The Alibaba Cloud account (primary account) of the task creator.

UserId.description: The Alibaba Cloud sub-account of the task creator.

AppName.description: The name of the user application targeted by this task.

Filters.description: The evaluation task needs to search for a certain amount of trace data generated by the user application as input data for the evaluation operation. This is a list that defines the search filter conditions.

Key.example:
ServiceId
ServiceName
Input
Output
Status
TraceType
SpanType
TraceName
SpanName

GmtCreateTime.description: UTC creation time of the task.

GmtStartTime.description: UTC start time of the trace data.

GmtEndTime.description: UTC end time of the trace data.

GmtLastSamplingWindowStartTime.description: UTC lower bound of the last sampling window.

GmtLastSamplingWindowEndTime.description: UTC upper bound of the last sampling window

SamplingFrequencyMinutes.description: The evaluation task needs to search for a certain amount of trace data generated by the user application as input data for the evaluation operation. This defines the width of the time window for each search of input data.

SamplingRatio.description: The percentage of the data found within a time window that is actually used as input for the evaluation task. For example, 100 means all the found data is used as input, 20 means 20% of the found data is randomly selected as input.

EvaluationConfig.description: Extract specific path values from JSON-formatted trace data as input for the evaluation operation. These JSON paths are defined within this EvaluationConfig structure.

ModelConfig.description: Access configuration structure for the large model used internally by the evaluation task.

GetOnlineEvalTask.title: Retrieve detailed information of a trace evaluation task.

ListOnlineEvalTaskResults.summary: List the results of online evaluation tasks that meet the criteria

schema.description: Specify a set of trace IDs, and only return the evaluation results for these traces. At least one of the trace ID or task ID must be set.
The current page number. Value range: integers greater than 0. Default value: 1.
Page size, default is 10.
The ID of the evaluation task. At least one of the trace ID or task ID must be set.

The same trace data may have been evaluated by different tasks. If no task ID is specified and there are multiple evaluation results for the same trace ID, this parameter specifies whether to return only the most recent evaluation result.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

CreateOnlineEvalTask.summary: Creates a trace evaluation task. The system will sample some data from the user's trace data based on the task's configuration. Then, an LLM is used to evaluate the performance of these traces, and the evaluation results are recorded.

AppName.description: The name of the user application in the trace data.

StartTime.description: The start time of the trace data, in UTC format.

EndTime.description: The end time of the trace data, in UTC format.

SamplingFrequencyMinutes.description: The evaluation task must search for a certain amount of trace data generated by the user application as input data for the evaluation. This is the width of the time window for each search of input data.

ListTracesDatas.summary: Obtains a list of trace data based on specified criteria.

schema.description: The list of trace IDs.
The list of span IDs. Each trace record contains one or more spans.

schema.title: 当总结果个数大于MaxResults时，用于翻页的token。
schema.description: The lower limit of the search time range, in UTC format (YYYY-mm-dd or YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss). By default, the value is (current time - 2 days).
The upper limit of the search time range, in UTC format (YYYY-mm-dd or YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss). By default, the value is (current time +10 minutes)
The page number. Page starts from page 1. Default value: 1
The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Maximum value: 100.

The value of the resources.service.app.name field in the trace record. It can contain upper and lower case letters, digits, dot (.), hyphen (-), and underscore (\_). Must be an exact match. It is empty by default.

Whether the returned JSON data can be directly converted to OpenTelemetry TracesData protobuf object. Default value: False. JSON data that is compatible with OpenTelemetry is more complex. Such data is generally not required unless you want to generate a protobuf object of OpenTelemetry.

Whether to return only trace records containing spans with a non-empty statusMessage. Example: Suppose a trace has 3 spans. If this parameter is True, this trace meets the condition when any one of the 3 spans has a non-empty statusMessage. The default value is False. The statusMessage is not used for filtering.

Whether to return only trace records containing spans with a non-empty events. Example: Suppose a trace has 3 spans. If this parameter is True, this trace meets the condition when any one of the 3 spans has a non-empty events. The default value is False. The events is not used for filtering.
The value of the resources.service.owner.sub_id field in the trace record. It can contain upper and lower case letters, digits, dot (.), hyphen (-), and underscore (\_). It is empty by default.
The value of the attributes.service.app.user_id field in the trace record. It can contain upper and lower case letters, digits, dot (.), hyphen (-), and underscore (\_). It is empty by default.
Other filter parameters

Key.description:
The name of the filter parameter, case-insensitive. Supported parameters: 'serviceid', 'servicename', 'input', 'output', 'status', 'tracetype', and 'tracename'.

The otel span attributes corresponding to the parameters:

serviceid: resources.service.id

servicename: resources.service.name

input: attributes.input.value

output: attributes.output.value

status: statusCode

tracetype: the attributes.gen_ai.span.kind of span whose parentSpanId is 0

tracename: the spanName of span whose parentSpanId is 0

Valid values:

*   Status
*   SpanName
*   Input
*   TraceType
*   SpanType
*   ServiceName
*   Output
*   TraceName
*   ServiceId

Operator.description:
The parameter operator. Case-insensitive. Supported operators: '=', 'contains', and 'startswith'.

Valid values:

*   contains
*   \=
*   startsWith

Value.description: The value of the filter parameter. For the contains operation, it is case-sensitive. For other operations, it is case-insensitive.

schema.description:
The content simplification method for returned trace data to reduce the data volume.

REMOVE_EMBEDDING: Removes all embedding array contents.

ROOT_ONLY: Returns only the root span for each trace, with the root span content also having the REMOVE_EMBEDDING applied.

Blank: Maintains the original data without simplification.
The field used to sort the returned results. Valid values: StartTime and Duration.

The sorting order. Valid values:

*   **ASC**
*   **DESC** (default)

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

TotalCount.title: 总记录数。
TotalCount.description: The total number of traces that meet the condition.

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

Traces.description: The JSON array with each element being a trace's JSON string. Length of the array is equal to or less than the page size parameter value.

items.description: A JSON string representing a trace.

ListTracesDatas.title: ListTracesDatas
ListTracesDatas.requestParamsDescription:
All parameters are AND-related. Multiple IDs within spanIds are OR-related. Multiple IDs within traceIds are OR-related. A trace meets the search criteria if any span matches the search conditions.

If you do not require support for OpenTelemetry format data, set the OpentelemetryCompatible parameter to False. This can simplify the structure of the returned JSON string.

CreateServiceIdentityRole.summary: Creates a service-linked role required for the PaiLLMTrace service.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.title: 调用失败后的错误码。
Code.description: The error code returned if the request fails.

Message.title: 调用失败后的错误信息。
Message.description: The error message returned if the request fails.
Message.example: User don't have permission to create SLR.

RoleName.description: The name of the service-linked role. Default value: AliyunServiceRoleForPaiLLMTrace.

CreateServiceIdentityRole.responseDemo:
[{"errorExample":"","example":"{
  "RequestId": "6A87228C-969A-1381-98CF-AE07AE630FA5",
  "Code": "InvalidInputParams",
  "Message": "User don't have permission to create SLR.",
  "RoleName": "AliyunServiceRoleForPaiLLMTrace",
  "RoleDetails": "AliyunServiceRoleForPaiLLMTrace"
}","type":"json"}]
CreateServiceIdentityRole.title: CreateServiceIdentityRole

GetServiceIdentityRole.summary: Obtains the information related to the service-linked role.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

RoleName.description: The name of the service-linked role. Default value: AliyunServiceRoleForPaiLLMTrace.

GetServiceIdentityRole.title: GetServiceIdentityRole

GetXtraceToken.summary: Obtains the token used in the Xtrace service and the endpoint required for uploading trace data.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

Token.description: The token used for uploading ARMS traces.

HttpEndpoint.description: The endpoint used for uploading ARMS traces.

HttpInternalEndpoint.description: The internal endpoint used for uploading ARMS traces used by Alibaba Cloud.

GrpcEndpoint.description: The gRPC endpoint used for uploading ARM traces.

GrpcInternalEndpoint.description: The internal gRPC endpoint used for uploading ARMS traces used by Alibaba Cloud.

GetXtraceToken.title: GetXtraceToken

ListEvalResults.summary: Obtains the list of results for trace evaluation. This API is used together with EvaluateTrace. EvaluateTrace starts the evaluation. ListEvalResults obtains the results.

schema.description: The trace data IDs.
The page number. Page starts from page 1. Default value: 1
The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 50. Default value: 10.
The task ID of the evaluation task to which the trace belongs.
The keyword to query from the evaluation inputs.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

RequestId.title: Id of the request
RequestId.description: The ID of the POP request.

Code.description: The internal error code. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

Message.description: The error message. This parameter is returned only when an error occurs.

TotalCount.description: The total number of results that meet the condition.

items.description: The evaluation result of a trace.

ListEvalResults.title: ListEvalResults
